name: Compatriot Lupara 151
description: 2010 Compatriot Lupara 151 (Click image to zoom) Don't be scared. Deadlines and angry bosses cannot infiltrate the mind or will of a dedicated snowboarder, so trade in your suit & tie for the best freestyle deck in the world, appropriately named after a sawed-off shotgun. With the help of team riders & park/jib gurus everywhere, we designed a high-end directional freestyle ride with the universiality a freeride board and the agility of a lightspeed park board. The Lupara's resume boasts of speed, light weight, and durability. The complex weave VerGlass Fiberglass, Knuckle Sandwich sintered UHMW sidewalls, and Durasurf professional grade base will make sure you get the job done right the first time. Highly experienced in rails, cheese wedges, and other administrative tasks. What's in your briefcase? Enter the world of The Lupara. Artwork by Draplin Industries. Length (cm): 151 Waist Width (cm): 24.9 Sidecut Radius (mm): 7.2 Aggression Index (1-10): 6 Click here to see the rest of the line.

name: Compatriot Brunch Tray 153 With Skunk Rocker
description: 2010 Compatriot Brunch Tray 153 (Click image to zoom) The Brunch Tray turns an average Saturday of backyard jibbing into a full-on celluloid-worthy session. We didn't want to offer a reverse camber board unless we could build one that doesn't ride like a noodle, and the Brunch Tray is the result of months of feedback and testing. This deck features our popular and user-friendly Skunk Rocker in order to create an all-around fun snowboard for riders of all skill levels. Artwork by Distrikt Collective. Length (cm): 153 Waist Width (cm): 24.5 Sidecut Radius (mm): 8.3 Aggression Index (1-10): 4 Click here to see the rest of the line.

name: Compatriot Movement 158
description: 2010 Compatriot Movement 158 (Click image to zoom) This is the one. Trust us. Simplicity in design and construction make this board a team favorite. The Movement is the culmination of several years of snowboard design, development, and product testing. While other companies are trying to hype up reverse camber construction, Compatriot stays true to our number one priority: performance. Enter EN7 Positive Camber, the ultimate in classic energy-responsive camber construction. Ride faster, ride harder, and experience the essence of snowboarding: the turn. Employing our proprietary CFX91 carbon fiber backbone and Knuckle Sandwich Sintered Sidewalls, this board has a smooth flex pattern that is stiff enough for Killington park and pipe missions, yet allows the perfect amount of freedom/flex in the right places for when you want to throw a few slashers into the trees. The artwork is based on futurist forbearer Fortunato Depero’s visionary design. Centered stance option and lightweight Cowboy Core construction. Artwork by Distrikt. Length (cm): 158 Waist Width (cm): 25.4 Sidecut Radius (mm): 7.6 Aggression Index (1-10): 8 Click here to see the rest of the line.

name: Compatriot Falcon GFR 160
description: 2010 Compatriot Falcon GFR 160 (Click image to zoom) This board beckons you to come hither. The Falcon GFR is the enhanced version of the Guide FR from a few years back. Slightly stiffer than the Movement yet with a less insistent sidecut, the Falcon GFR boasts a lightweight yet durable full wood Cowboy Core bonded with our Special Sauce resins to make sure you can get more than one season out of your snowboard investment. Employing our proprietary CFX91 carbon fiber backbone and Knuckle Sandwich Sintered Sidewalls, this board has a smooth flex pattern that is stiff enough for Killington park and pipe missions, yet allows the perfect amount of freedom/flex in the right places for when you want to throw a few slashers into the trees. A great all-mountain board for the discerning snowboard aficionado, this ride is equally at home at Snow Valley as it is in the Chugach. Artwork by SFaustina. Length (cm): 160 Waist Width (cm): 25.0 Sidecut Radius (mm): 7.9 Aggression Index (1-10): 7 Click here to see the rest of the line.

name: Compatriot Outra Vez 164.5 Midwide
description: 2010 Compatriot Outra Vez 164.5 MidWide (Click image to zoom) Compatriot’s best seller and powderhound pleaser returns. The board of choice for the tram junkies at Jackson Hole and Mammoth. The Cowboy Core superlight full wood construction paired with the CFX91 Carbon Fiber Stringers ensure that this board will float in the deeps and hold an edge in the steeps. Lighter than other contenders in the 164cm range, The Outra Vez is pure pleasure in gauntlets like Four Pines and Tuckerman's. Outra Vez is Portuguese for "one more time." This title was chosen specifically because this board is so light and so fun, you'll want to hike Mary's or beyond Rendezvous one more time, and the tuff DuraSurf 4000 base won't be pushed around by any core-shot conquistadores...The Outra Vez truly delivers. Artwork by Draplin Industries. Length (cm): 164.5 Waist Width (cm): 25.9 Sidecut Radius (mm): 8.0 Aggression Index (1-10): 6 Click here to see the rest of the line.

name: Compatriot Commissioner 169
description: 2010 Compatriot Commissioner 169 (Tapered Powder Slayer) (Click image to zoom) We don't mess around, and neither does the Commissioner. This ultra-limited powder slayer was designed to put the kibosh on untracked powder fields. Unlike other tapered powder sticks, you can ride the Commissioner fast: Ride it any time, any place. The Knuckle Sandwich sidewall construction and seamless base make this board tough enough for preemptive October strikes, and the HellBent spade nose has a very slight powder rocker beyond the front contact points and a killer pin shape. While you may find it surprisingly light for a 169, you won't be surprised by its performance. Artwork by Distrikt. Length (cm): 169 Waist Width (cm): 25.9 Sidecut Radius (mm): 8.5 Aggression Index (1-10): 7 Click here to see the rest of the line.
